des-road: We are working hard every day to bring a genuine blockchain project to the community.

roads.title: Launch
content: Calling for affiliates to join ViRef marketing.
Deploy smart contract, Private sale, Building a cryptocurrency exchange

roads.title: Acceleration
content: Completing all blockchain transaction features on the app
Building an orderbook trading platform on the app
Continuing to attract affiliates to join ViRef

roads.title: Take off
roads.desc: Gia tăng nhiều giá trị cho cộng đồng
content: Deploy NFT project using VREF tokens for transactions
Build a Defi ecosystem around VREF tokens such as insurance, mortgage..
